column3: I liked the fact that it's very close to the Station.
column4: Could have had air-conditioning in the room. I was sweating like the Niagara Falls in the bed.

column3: Hotel is one minut from Antwerp centraal station which is great. Near by centar, good option for those who wants to travel to the other cities like Brugge, Gant. Room was really clean, and staff was great.

The hotel was centrally located right next to Antwerp Central train station, probably 100m away, which was a huge bonus especially if carrying around lots of luggage as we were (no need for a taxi). We only stayed one evening but found the room was clean and tidy, the bed was comfy and the place offered good value for money
column4: The interior of the premises appeared dated but other than that, no real faults identified.

column3: Hotel is very close to railway station, but city center could be reached in 10-15 minutes on foot. Our room was small, but very clean, with big bathroom.
column4: Wi-fi didn't work in our room (

column3: I really liked the location, it was really easy and accessible for the train station. The hotel is definitely a 'budget' hotel, but I got what I paid for. The staff were very friendly and welcoming.
column4: I cant really fault it. It's a budget hotel, but that's what I paid for; I want expecting the Ritz!

column3: Best location.Just in front of the train station with so many resturant around.Metro station is also only150 meters walk.Good price.Comfort bed.
column4: Basic hotel.No refrig.No kettle.No aircon.I slept very well here because I stay in October and at high floor.If you stay here in summer and at lower floor,everything may be opposite to my stay!
